website_summaries.verdict: A healthy environment for your betta fish with a divider to allow you to have two bettas safely.
pros: Includes a divider, which allows you to house two male betta fish
Includes a night light and a filtering system to make the environment healthier for your fish and allows you to change the water less often
Solid lid includes a feeding hold
No need to remove the lid for feeding
Kit includes filter, food, and water conditioner for betta fish
cons: Filter has a tendency to move the water around a lot more than some smaller bettas can handle
You may have to turn it off temporarily for feeding

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. The divider doesnt work, one of the betta keeps swimming around it. Also, the top piece doesnt even fit so that's just useless. This is what happened when he swam around the "divider". Poor fish
customer_reviews.author: Tommy D.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Tank for 2 Bettas
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible tank for Betta fishes. The middle border doesn't properly separate them and i found both my Bettas on the same side once. The filter is a terrible thing for Bettas, The constant and strong waterflow from it stresses the Bettas, I literally owned this for 3 hours and all these problems occurred. I would highly not recommend buying this for 2 Bettas. Buying it for a single Bettsa fish seems fine though.
customer_reviews.author: stanley ng

customer_reviews.title: Killed our fish!
customer_reviews.text: The tank is nice, but the filter was too strong for our Betta fish. We found it sucked up into the filter. I wish I'd noticed the review about purchasing filter sponges before adding our fish to this tank. This was my kids' first pet and they are devastated. Not sure if the sponges will make a difference for Betta's long fins, but may be worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BETA FISH
customer_reviews.text: The center flimsy plastic piece that is supposed to keep the Beta fish is absolutely horrible the fish are able to push it around and often end up on the same side. If you know anything about Beta fish they cannot be together as they fight each other. I would NOT recommend buying this tank it is not worth the money or stress of watching your fish try to hurt each other.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mine to replace the separate bowls I had for my two Beta's. Although the barrier is very nice, the two fish still hate each other and fought to the point where I had to return one back to the bowl. THIS LITTLE TANK WOULD BE GREAT FOR JUST ONE BETA or several various SMALL tropicals. It's beautiful when set up. What I don't like about it - the top fits together very poorly and has a tendency to slide when touched; that being said I will be purchasing one for our 11-year-old granddaughter for her birthday. She fell in love with it and it's a great size to fit anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Rob G.

customer_reviews.title: Defect on lid
customer_reviews.text: My Two Beta fish enjoy the larger area. The problem is the top must be the wrong one. It does not match the picture in the instructions. There is a place for the wires of filter to go through the back. My husband and I both tried and tried and there was no way this could be done. The whole for the wire is in the wrong place. It doesn't even match the picture. So the top does not click into the bottom. If you bump it the light and top will fall to the ground. I have it just set on top of the wires for filter and light. NOT happy with that Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Weak  divider
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this fish tank for my betta fish I had them for less than a day and found them dead the next day. The divider needs to be wider and stiffer I found my fish on the same side the next day
customer_reviews.author: Edward Carter

customer_reviews.title: No gaps works perfect if installed properly
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect if you install the divider the right way it has no gap if you install it upside down you will have a gap like the people who are complaining but I can assure you there is no gap with the tab toward the bottom
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for Betas or other aggressive fish.
customer_reviews.text: Decent starter tank for the price.. Would not recommend for betas or other aggressive fish. The partition has large gaps allowing them to see each other very clearly, constantly encouraging aggressive territorial behavior. Which wouldn't necessarily be too much of an issue, however the filter pressure pushes their fins through the gaps allowing access to each other even with a barrier between them leaving significant potential for injury.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little fish tank because it had a divider that was supposed to enable the owner to place two betta fish in the same tank without them being able to get to each other and fighting. The divider however failed to reach the sides of the slightly curved tank walls and allowed for room for the fish to wiggle through and fight. This was after we had to drill a hole in the intake for the pump that the manufacture failed to do to allow water to flow up into the filter. I do not recommend this product,
customer_reviews.author: corrina j ford

customer_reviews.title: Divider has gaps.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 8 year old granddaughter who loves beta fish. We set the tank up, let it run for a few days and head out to the pet store for a couple of fish. After spending 40.00 on the fish we discovered there are gaps between the divider and the tank which allows the fish to go back and forth. Needless to say, there is only 1 beta that survived. The tank itself with everything else is good, just don't trust the divider.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hasselmann

customer_reviews.title: Lousy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tank in November and I lost both of my betta fish within 3 weeks of putting them in this tank I lost my last betta last night number one how are the bettas supposed to eat when you put food in the tank and the pump pulls all the food away and they can't get it the pellets I feed them are always on top of the filter or stuck in the black tube,it really upsets me they can't get the food
customer_reviews.author: wanda dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Cute tank
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do NOT like about this tank is that the filter takes up a majority of the one side. Feeding the beta on that side is a bit hard becuase the food gets filtered to other side 1st. You have to remove top to feed fish twords the back. East to clean, the replacement filters are a bit pricey (paid $9+ for 3 or 4) Compared to my 10 gallon where I can get 10 for $4.00 But I like the fact that both are my betas can see eachother, I feel like they are not lonely....😉
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tank
customer_reviews.text: I have the 5 gallon version and this one is great too. I wonder why there isn’t a betta divider for the bigger one? My kids would have liked that. I have no plans to use the divider that came with this one. In fact it’s going to be a quarantine for some bumblebee gobies. This one arrived pretty scratched up which I wouldn’t consider “Like New” condition, but I needed it and was pleased to find that the scratches aren’t visible once there is water in it.
customer_reviews.author: Squeaky McMurdo

customer_reviews.title: Filter is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Tank is pretty nice however the filter stopped working 5 days after using. Must be a defect. The filter got dirty super fast. I contacted amazon and they are sending me a new tank however I already have it set up with my fish in it so I’m going to have to just switch out the filter and hope it doesn’t break again but in the meantime my tank doesn’t have a working filter let’s hope my panda corydoras survive til the new one get here
customer_reviews.author: Kim Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one betta fish
customer_reviews.text: My beta fish absolutely loves this however I saw some comment saying that the divider wasn’t that helpful for keeping the fish separated so I only have one fish in this tank with no divider. He absolutely loves it and swims around a lot more than he did in his 1 gallon tank, the light is very bright, I haven’t tried the filter yet but I’ve set it up and it was an easy set up
customer_reviews.author: debbie3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 1 beta fish only
customer_reviews.text: Good for one fish. We had two beta fish at first but it seemed to stress them out, as if it were too small of a tank to be divided; unfortunately one fish died. Now having to add a 25w heater to the tank as the colder season is approaching, I couldn't imagine the two fish living happily together with less room.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner's aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like the aquarium as I have my two bettas in there. Affectionately known as Slush and Flush. Years ago I owned a Biorb that costs three times as much and was always dirty and gross. The only complaint I have is that the cover does not click into place so it just kind of sits on top. Also, since one side of the tank houses the filter, my red boy has to swim against the tide so to speak when I feed him.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmi C

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tank, but the filter is too strong for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tank, but the filter is too strong for betta fish. I bought a filter sponge cover thing and it stops the fish from getting sucked into the filter. I bought mine at Petco but this is pretty much the same thing ( I definitely recommend buying this if you’re planning on getting this tank and have a betta
customer_reviews.author: anissa lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Poor engineering of the partition!
customer_reviews.text: Don't purchase this tank! It's a good price but the tank's shape is not met by the separation partition inside the tank. The tank itself has a curve in the front, and the partition inside doesn't fan out to compensate for that curve, which led to one beta fish squeezing by the partition and killing the other fish! It's basic math to compensate for the curve especially if the whole premise of selling the tank is based on the fact that two beta fish can live safely side by side because of said "partitioning ".....Not!👌😭
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Baptiste

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: Great tank! I did not have a problem with the divider like I read in some other reviews. My bettas have been in there ir a couple month now and havent been able to get to each other. I don't use the filter but have read it is too powerful for the tank size so I would try it out and watch the fish before leaving it on.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Master

customer_reviews.title: Good size for a single betta
customer_reviews.text: My betta loves the tank, I can tell by the huge bubble nest he has made. It will work well with a heater, when the time comes to add one. It did get a film at first, skimmed it off and it hasn't returned. I haven't used the filter. Note that you do need to buy substrate/gravel as well. The tank would be too small for two male betta, maybe ok for 3 small female betta or a few guppies.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine, I saw you peeping

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Please do not waste money on this product. We have 2 beta fish. Set up the tank and put the fish in. Within 10 minutes one had gotten past the divider. So it became a tank for one fish. That one fish spent a lot of time at the bottom corner hiding behind an ornament as the filter is strong. Found that fish dead with its tail sucked into the filter tonight. Quite distressing for my 5 year old to see her first pet like this.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Marks

customer_reviews.title: Dont get for a betta
customer_reviews.text: While this is a cute aquarium, do not get it for a Betta. The problem with this is the filter- it's too strong and it takes up too much room in the aquarium. I would have returned this aquarium because I couldn't use it after I after I set it up, however I was in the hospital and missed the return window. Other than the filter issue, it's a cute, nice shaped little aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic, bettas escape
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was super cool for the price however, one betta (who was stronger) kept escaping to the other side, which I was so nervous about because it tried to kill the other betta... that is their nature. 3 times now I have managed to separate then back and both are fine but who knows what will happen when I am not watching while at work or sleeping...? Cheap piece of plastic in the middle, it does not fit properly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not use this for Bettas
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tank and would be good for other fish but not bettas! The divider does not fit flush against the sides of the tank and the bettas can fit through and one of our males attacked and killed the other. Also, when they get close to the divider, their tails stick through and then they attack each other that way too. It is a neat idea, but not for bettas.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Our fish are happy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tank. The only odd thing is that the side with the filter causes the food to blow to the opposite side so it’s important to pay attention and make sure one fish isn’t being under fed and the other one over fed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Natale

customer_reviews.title: Bad filter
customer_reviews.text: This fish tank does not work. The divider in between makes it so one side is filtered and the other side is not. I also feel like the "cleaner" of the 2 sides still has a lot of algae in it and if the filter doesn't work. It has only been hooked up for 2 weeks and it is filthy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I will not be buying this fish tank ever again my two babies were constantly fighting because they were able to get in between the screen and switch from each side and the filter is too powerful it’s just kept pushing my beta that survived around until he eventually died this tank cost me two beta fish Will not recommend !!! I keep my betas alive for years but this tank killed them in less than a week because they were able to fight
customer_reviews.author: Patrease Manning

customer_reviews.title: Pump will die, no customer support
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this tank. The pump will die. There is no way to buy a new one. Company will not respond to emails. Company has no ability on their website to buy a new pump. Move on, don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Divider
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift. Went to set it up, after purchasing a second Betta fish, and there is no divider, so no way to separate the two fish. Now I have nowhere to put the second Betta.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. Throckmorton

customer_reviews.title: Great tank great price!
customer_reviews.text: This tank performs exactly as advertised, and was super easy to set up. I bought the heater separate but otherwise everything you need for a happy fish.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality QUIET FILTER! Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I am so happy with this product! Nice size and the filter is QUIET! Easy to assemble & comes with a sample of water conditioner and food. Very very happy with this product. We have 2 Beta fish and they have a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Robles

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dividing fish
customer_reviews.text: The bottom doesn’t snap on it just has the whole tank sir lossly on top. The plastic divider inside doesn’t fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY MISSING PARTS!!
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy wrong product sent with no box. If not wrong product then the tank is missing the divider tab to house 2 bettas. It came in a brown cardboard box. Not advertise as listed. My 1st review was remove.
customer_reviews.author: RandomBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Insert The Divider Correctly!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mini tank for Bettas. The divider works just fine. You have to insert it correctly with the base being the one with the foot at the end. I haven’t had any issues and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Ambercool

customer_reviews.title: Tank good.Filtration system poor design.
customer_reviews.text: the tank is good. The light is very bright. The water gets pulled in by a tub and filters OVER a filter pad spilling out into the tank from the same place! keep an eye on water levels when using this tank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a three star?!
customer_reviews.text: This Aqueon aquarium didn't come with the heater like advertised. It also didn't come in it's original box, maybe that's where the heater is? I'm giving a three star now because my betta can't eat the pump/filter is too strong and his food ends up in the filter. It is stressing him out, he can't relax or eat.
customer_reviews.author: Elona

customer_reviews.title: Important detail oversight
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's not a bad deal. The only thing is when you fill it to the top with water, it bulges enough to where the divider doesn't reach the edges at the top and one of our betas got through to the other side. KIND OF A BIG DEAL! We lowered the water level and are just dealing with it that way... Come to think of it, should've put 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great little tank
customer_reviews.text: This tank worked great for my 2 bettas. The it was simple to set up, it has a strong little filter and lights up beautifully. My fish are loving as well. The omly issue i have is there is a small gap in the top back portion of the divider that allowed my tiny betta through the otger side. I was able to fix it with some foam, but if you have tiny fish i wouldn't recommend using the divider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tank for betta fish!
customer_reviews.text: This merchandise was terrible the divider has slits in it and my betta fish got into the other area betta fish are not supposed to live together it's a good thing I saw this I now use it for just a goldfish tank with a filter. Very disappointing I would never buy this tank or referring to anyone else with betta fish
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Langer

customer_reviews.title: Partition is not effective
customer_reviews.text: Bought this task to replace my cracked tank which held 2 betas. The partition is not effective. The fish were able to swim into the other section, and one fish got killed. Afterwards, the remaining fish (which was not the one that swan into his peer's section), squeezed itself into the other section and back, repeatedly.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy Filter; Reflective Sides
customer_reviews.text: It will do for now. But the filter is pretty noisy after the first 20 minutes of use. I have to unplug it at night to sleep. The plastic siding is also very reflective so my betta is constantly flaring his gills at himself in the back corners.
customer_reviews.author: ahhhloren

customer_reviews.title: Not good for two betta
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Got this tank to allow my daughter’s betta fish to cohabitate. Within minutes, they were in the same side. I have been working for two days to get this thing to work ( flipping, moving, wedging) and they still manage to get together and are scarring each other. I wish I had spent money on a more sturdy model.
customer_reviews.author: Stephani p

customer_reviews.title: I love this fish tank
customer_reviews.text: I love this fish tank. I set it up today and it looks beautiful reason why I don't give 5 starts is because it had some scratches, and the division of the fish tank doesn't work, it doesn't fit tight enough my two better fishes kept swimming around it, so now I need to fix that issue.
customer_reviews.author: iap

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this product!!!!! Unfortunately I could not get the lid to fit on at all and then after reading comments many said the betas could get around the fence if wanting to. I was very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I use in my office so I really enjoy that it is compact and like the contemporary design. Very sturdy and quite... packaged vey well and shipped timely. I would reorder and recommend to friend and family.
customer_reviews.author: InspireMaggie

customer_reviews.title: Killed my betta
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this tank. I did everything right, let it cycle for a few days, checked the water ph etc., made sure the temperature was right, used the water purifier that came with the tank, and less than 12 hours after my fish was in the tank he was dead. Absolutely devastated.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I have the tank set up on my desk in the office I work in. I have a Betta and two mollies in it and they seem to be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: L JN Baptist

customer_reviews.title: horrible for betas
customer_reviews.text: This tank is a piece of garbage. One of the betas were still attacked dispite the barrier and lost their tail fins.
customer_reviews.author: David Barker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and a good looking tank
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and a good looking tank. We have two Betas in the tank with the divider up and they are thriving.
customer_reviews.author: Smile :)

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute though...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this fish tank was perfect for my fish but within less than a month the filter broke and would make a super weird noise when it was plugged in. Did what i could to try and fix it but wasn’t able to get it going again.
customer_reviews.author: Angelicahh Torres

customer_reviews.title: Nice design!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for one Beta fish...for two is too small. Comes with everything and it has a cute design.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana L.

customer_reviews.title: The filters quit working on both tanks.
customer_reviews.text: I'm still in disbelief, but the filters in both tanks i purchased quit working within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Nesloney

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your money
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe that the filter stopped working after having it for just a few months, and it does not maintain the water clean at all. I change filters every two weeks ( for only ONE betta fish) and I have to clean the entire tank at least once a month. Well, not anymore, as I have to buy another one, because the filter doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher angelo

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday gift for my 10 year old nephew!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It lights and you can enjoy the fish swimming in the beautiful tank with decoration,
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Cute little tank. Quiet as others have said. FYI - the Betta tank does not come with the heater as stated in one of the customer questions. You have to purchase it separately. Easy to assemble. You may want to buy your gravel and plants before you get the tank. Once you set it up the instructions say to wait 24 hours before you add your fish.
customer_reviews.author: M. Samora

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Tank is a great size for two bettas with divider. The LED light looks nice and filters are easy to buy/change. Filtration works great. The tank is crystal clear all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Rambis

customer_reviews.title: Divider sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The divider doesn't work well. The bettas swam around it, three to!as in two days. Twice they ended up on the same side o c.f. They switched sides. Divider is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too big not too small
customer_reviews.text: One of my beta fish seemed to dislike the stronger current and stayed in a place away from the current so I switched tanks and put a different beta in the tank who seems to love it
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid Howe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect And best choice
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tank for our beta(only 1fish) and I couldn’t have asked for a better tank. The pump is perfect for the tank and the fish has plenty of room to swim around. Filet works great for the six just don’t over feed or you will end up with dingy water and need a water change every week. But all in all great tank.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F Brooks

customer_reviews.title: The partition does Not fit against the front glass.  Smaller bettas can get thru.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a beta tank for 2 betas One was a little thinner and got thru to the other side the partition does NOT fit tight against the front. both fish died. great for one beta.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware the divider
customer_reviews.text: This tank is good but an hour into my betta being in it, it’s tail got caught in the divider and was stuck. So be careful with the divider.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning because there were several scratches on the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Wicked_Wisteria_Craft

customer_reviews.title: Fine little aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this aquarium for our betta. He seems much happier than in his small jar we got him in. I do wish the light was a little brighter, but overall very happy with the low flow of the filter and general size/ease of cleaning. We may opt to get a larger tank in the future for him, but this is fine for now!
customer_reviews.author: Kate A Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great tank for little fish
customer_reviews.text: great tank for a reasonable price, it is a little noisy with the pump on
customer_reviews.author: monia

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend this tank
customer_reviews.text: The crappy part about this tank is that the filter isn’t in the middle so it pulls the water to the left side of the tank, so when you feed your fish the food doesn’t get to the fish on the right. When I feed them I have to unplug the filter until they are done which is pretty annoying
customer_reviews.author: riley

customer_reviews.title: Divider does not work
customer_reviews.text: Our two beta fish can easily swim between the divider and the side of the fish tank. They were only in the tank for a few minutes before we found both fish on the same side. When I tried to remove one of the fish with the net, it swam back to the other side. Now I will have to buy another tank to keep them separated.
customer_reviews.author: Jill L Richards

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: As expected but the cost is a little to high
customer_reviews.author: Kim Easter

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Would be five star if the center divider would snap in place more securely.
customer_reviews.author: Chris NY

customer_reviews.title: Feeding issues due to filter
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice tank.. but I'm not liking when I feed my fish on the side where the filter is all the food goes to the other side where the other fish is.. find this annoying. I just got this tank and finding only way to prevent this is to unplug the filter.. that's not very ideal..
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Allen

customer_reviews.title: Aqueon Fish Tanks are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cute fish tank! It fits perfectly in my apartment on the bar. I bought a gorgeous beta fish and he loves it :) Especially with my purple flowers, it looks so cute! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Pagan

customer_reviews.title: beta tank
customer_reviews.text: love this tank it is perfect for two beta's.pump and light works great.
customer_reviews.author: Flora  Lee Claxton

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank
customer_reviews.text: Nice size tank. Divider did not work. Fishes kept switching sides. The cord that is on the top doesn’t lay flat in the opening provided. Not critical but too does not lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanifer Randall

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I'd love this even more if the filter went into the water more. Having issues with it filtering after a couple of days and water evaporates
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Nice but current is a little strong
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank! It’s very nice looking, not to big, not to small. BUT, I think the current is a little to strong for my Betta. I have to shut the filter off when he eats because the food moves around and around.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: The separation divider dosemt keep fish apart
customer_reviews.text: Really cool design and overall great idea. Fish have lots of room. Easy to clean. *before set up buy gravel
customer_reviews.author: courtney allen

customer_reviews.title: Over all well
customer_reviews.text: So it’s an awesome tank! Kicking little filter, divider sucks. The fish can definitely get thru if they want too like mine have!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tank
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this for separating her male and female beta. It has worked out just fine for us
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank.
customer_reviews.text: Good little tank for our beta, but the filter current is too strong. Would be better with a low flow filter.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Divider does not serve any purpose due to faulty design.Hours after I bought my bettas and placed each one in their respective side of the tank,one got over to the other side and both almost killed each other. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: AllyC

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep your bettas safe
customer_reviews.text: Within an hour one betta was able to get to the other by slipping between the glass and divider (he is not small where he should be able to do that) and there is a chip on the outside of the tank
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tank for the value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tank for three guppies or one betta and a snail. Nothing much else. But very cute and self contained.
customer_reviews.author: Just Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good for one fish
customer_reviews.text: The separate section thing, really didn’t fit that well, but if you have the tank for just one fish it works really well, and it comes with everything you need
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Betta
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my two Bettas, after I got it few weeks lake time of my bettas swam through a crack that looked sealed and killed the fish.. :( recommend adding different fish species, like a chubby fish
customer_reviews.author: Yaana Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Great little tank
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Betta fish, looks nice easy to clean. Fast shipping received it on time.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Hernandez Latorre

customer_reviews.title: Divider needs correction!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product needs to be reviewed by the seller! My fish were able to get through the divider! I think the problem is the back is straight and the front is slightly rounded. Disappointed!! And I lost two fish!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Top doesn't fit snugly.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this tank today and set it up. However. It will not close properly at the first top. I can almost get there sides closed but the fourth will not close properly making it secure. I attached a photo. Is it just me or do I need a new one?
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L. Gaglio

customer_reviews.title: Strong filter.
customer_reviews.text: The filter is pretty strong in this little tank and will push the fish down to the bottom if they are under where the water comes out. Other than that is it great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: Seperator not effective
customer_reviews.text: It's fine generally, but we used it to house our 2 Bettas and they were able to get through or around the separator and now we have 1 betta
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep them separate!
customer_reviews.text: Love it for single betta... Does NOT work for two. Bettas can somehow get around the divider in the middle... Then you have tragedy on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: steph3

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great fish tank. Easy to clean and clears up with regular filter changing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: There is no light switch
customer_reviews.text: The tank is nice, everything was going well till I realized they didn’t send the adapter for the light. My fish now have no light. Also the tank lid doesn’t have the hole in the right spots for the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! There is a big space on each side ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! There is a big space on each side of the divider so the Betas can get through. The divider does not divide! 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: jen scioli

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tank but the filter is too strong for a betta
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for in a tank for my two beta fish but the filter stopped working for some reason after less than a month. I cannot fix it so I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden Berry

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts. No tank divider
customer_reviews.text: Did not have tank divider! That’s the only reason I purchased it. I need a divided Betta tank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beta Aquarium
customer_reviews.text: I love this aquarium for my beta. It is beautiful and a good size. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jowens

customer_reviews.title: Divider doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this product doesnt work. My daughter came home from school to find her fish fighting. The divider has a big enough gap along the edge of the tank so the fish can slip through.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Belrose

customer_reviews.title: My missing part
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this but it was missing impeller so I can not run filter how do I get another one?and it wasn't delivered to me it was shoved into my mailbox opened
customer_reviews.author: Susan

product_meta.title: Aqueon LED MiniBow Aquarium Starter Kits with LED Lighting
product_meta.description: Size:2.5 Gallon Betta| Color:BlackFor many people, their first experience in the aquatic hobby is with a betta. These habitats no longer need to be a simple bowl. Aqueon offers LED lighting inside a betta habitat that is attractive, stylish and will get a beginner or experienced aquarist off on the right foot.
feature_bullets: Simple to setup and maintain, this is perfect for your betta
Includes: dividers, small filtration cartridge, food and water care samples
Uses Aqueon QuietFlow Filtration and Small Aqueon Replacement Filter Cartridges
Sleek, low profile LED energy efficient light hood with feeding hole
Elevated base adds an extra flair to the design
Divider installs easily with "bottom" clearly marked; slide through slots inside aquarium to keep two bettas in the same aquarium

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
